title: Display committee name near logo and fix Jaunpur spelling

requirements.summary: Display committee name text adjacent to the logo in the Header component
acceptanceCriteria: The committee name is rendered in the header, adjacent to (beside or below) the logo on the left side
The committee name is visible on both desktop and mobile layouts
Existing logo and navigation functionality remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Add committee name text display next to/below the logo in the header's left branding section. Position the text to be visible on both desktop and mobile layouts without disrupting existing logo image or navigation elements. Use appropriate Devanagari typography and styling consistent with the site's warm color palette.

requirements.summary: Replace all occurrences of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' across frontend files
acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'जैनपुर' remains anywhere in the frontend source files
The page title in index.html is also updated if it contains 'जैनपुर'

file_operations.description: Replace all instances of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' in the HTML document, including the page title and meta description that reference महराजगंज जैनपुर.
Replace all instances of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' in any text content, including navigation labels, branding text, or accessibility labels.
Replace all instances of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' in footer text content, including branding, contact details, or any other text references.
Replace all instances of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' in hero section text content, including headings, subheadings, or descriptive text.
Replace all instances of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' in contact section text, including address details, location references, or any other content.
